choose_how: Choose how you want to enter
read_protocol:
Read the protocol.
Learn the rules.
Understand the system.
participate_desc:
Check-in daily.
Accumulate HUM.
Become part of the process.
section_1_p: HUMAN is an experimental protocol that uses real human behavior as its source of value. The resource is YOU — your choice to show up today and tomorrow.
section_2_p: Open the app → confirm you exist today → earn HUM. Simple.
section_3_p: One day = one chance. The timer resets daily.
section_4_p: Distribution adapts to active participants. More people → shared rewards. Fewer people → larger rewards.
section_5_p: From collective irregularity emerge patterns. HUM embraces oscillation and turns it into structure.
section_6_p: No invites, no payments, no boosts. Showing up is enough.
section_7_p: No premine or hidden reserves. Every HUM is created from real action.
section_8_p: No KYC or personal data. When HUM moves on-chain, it's yours forever.
section_9_p: Build streaks, badges, and presence history. Motivational, not mandatory.
section_10_p: Today HUM symbolizes participation. Tomorrow it may expand to utility, governance, and apps.
section_11_p: The community is the core. No hidden leaders. The path is built collectively.
faq_2: Do I lose HUM if I skip? No.
faq_4: Is it worth money? Not now. Future utility possible.
faq_5: Why TON? Fast, mobile and cheap.
faq_6: When token? When the community is ready.
